p: Mim (400 μL, 5.02 mmol) and 1 (32.4 mg, 0.0330 mmol) were dissolved in 1 mL CH 2Cl 2, followed by addition of a 9 mL layer of Et 2O on the solution. The solution was allowed to stand for several days, resulting in formation of yellow crystals, which were filtered and washed with Et 2O. Yield: 34.5 mg (84.8%). Anal. Calcd for C 60H 52N 9P 2Re·CH 2Cl 2: C, 59.46; H, 4.42; N, 10.23%. Found: C, 59.32; H, 4.58; N, 10.23%. 1H NMR in CD 3CN/ppm: 3.64 (s, 6H, Mim), 6.82 (t, 2H, Mim), 6.93 (t, 2H, Mim), 7.45 (t, 2H, Mim), 7.60–7.90 (40H, PPh 4 +). UV–vis/nm in the solid state: 418. IR (KBr pellet)/cm –1: 2133 (ν C≡N), 2110 (ν C≡N), 2102 (ν C≡N).
